results.title: Effect of statins on coronary bifurcation atherosclerosis: an intravascular ultrasound virtual histology study.
results.text_hl: VH-IVUS analysis of @<m>DISEASE_Gollop_Coates_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537283 @@@bifurcation@@@ lesions included the 5-mm proximal, @<m>DISEASE_Gollop_Coates_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537283 @@@bifurcation@@@ only (side-branch point) and 5-mm distal subsegments.
